ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He offered it to them and then exclaimed, 'Do you not then eat?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And placing it before them said: "Won't you eat?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and laid it before them, saying: “Will you not eat?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He placed it before them. Then he said, "Why are you not eating?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He then presented it before them and said, “Do you not eat?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And placed it before them (saying): "Will you not eat"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So he brought it near them. He said: What! will you not eat?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and he laid it before them saying, 'Will you not eat?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And he set it before them, saying: Will ye not eat?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and placed it before them. "Will you not eat?" he said,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And he set it before them, and said: wherefore eat ye not?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and put it near them. He said, ‘Will you not eat?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And placed it before them.. he said, "Will ye not eat?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And placed it before them, (saying): "Will you not eat?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He set it before them, saying: 'Will you not eat'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He set it before them. He said, “Will you not eat?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And placed it near them; he said, "Will you not eat?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [51:27] and he placed it near them saying, ‘Will you not eat?’: he invited them to eat, but they did not respond.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And he set it before them) but when he saw that they did not reach to it, (saying: Will ye not eat) the food?
